titleStmt.title: A moderate and most proper reply to a declaration, printed and published under His Maiesties name, December 8 intended against an ordinance of Parliament for assessing, but indeed animating and encouraging the malignants, and delinquents, in their violent courses, for the maintenance of themselves, and their malignant army.
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Prynne --Cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
